name: Loaded Battleaxe
description: It's an axe

name: Monofilament Whip
description: A razor-thin filament coil capable of slicing through armor and bone. Deadly, silent, and banned in most civilized zones.
cybermancy-feature-effect: On a Hope win, deal Severe damage if the Fear die shows 8-12.
critical-effect: Sever or disable a limb, item, or piece of cover.

name: Cyber Spur
description: A retractable blade hidden in the user’s forearm, perfect for sudden, lethal strikes in close quarters.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Can be hidden; gain advantage on your first attack each scene.
critical-effect: If striking from surprise, escalate Fear consequences for target.

name: Shock Baton
description: A polymer club fitted with a high-voltage capacitor, used by corp security and riot control alike.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Spend a Hope on a successful hit to inflict Dazed for one round.
critical-effect: Target is stunned or unconscious for one scene beat.

name: Vibro-Knife
description: A short combat blade that hums at ultrasonic speed, capable of piercing armor with surgical precision.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Ignores armor on a Hope critical.
critical-effect: Disable one target silently with no alert escalation.

name: Smartpistol
description: Compact sidearm with digital targeting and auto-adjust systems, favored by professional runners.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Once per scene, reroll one attack die if linked to cyberware/gear.
critical-effect: Crit ignores cover; disable weapon/armor.

name: SMG (Machine Pistol)
description: Lightweight submachine gun optimized for close-quarters burst fire; loud, fast, and unforgiving.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Mark 1 Stress to attack an additional target in Close range.
critical-effect: Hit all targets in Very Close range with collateral fire.

name: Assault Rifle
description: The runner’s staple: reliable, lethal, and adaptable across every corporate warzone on Earth.
cybermancy-feature-effect: On a Hope win, target must mark 1 Stress to act next turn.
critical-effect: Force enemy into cover, reducing their next attack roll.

name: Shotgun
description: Brutal close-range weapon that clears hallways with concussive thunder and devastating scatter.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Spend a Hope to attack all targets in Very Close range.
critical-effect: Knock back and lose next action.

name: Sniper Rifle
description: Precision weapon built for the patient killer — silent, steady, and unerring over long distances.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Spend a round aiming to gain advantage on next shot.
critical-effect: Bullet passes through to a second target in line.

name: Throwing Knives
description: Balanced steel blades designed for silent takedowns or distraction in the shadows.
cybermancy-feature-effect: May be used as a reaction against melee attackers.
critical-effect: Pin targets limb, weapon, or clothing, restricting movement.

name: Fragmentation Grenade
description: A high-yield fragmentation device scattering lethal shrapnel in every direction.
cybermancy-feature-effect: On Hope win, half damage to all in Close range.
critical-effect: All enemies in area take full damage and mark 1 Stress.

name: EMP Grenade
description: Pulse emitter that fries circuits, drones, and cyberware with a single electromagnetic burst.
cybermancy-feature-effect: On hit, drones/tech in range must succeed or shut down 1 round.
critical-effect: All devices in area disabled until end of scene.

name: Improved Monofilament Whip
description: A reinforced filament with servo control for higher cutting torque and unmatched lethality.
cybermancy-feature-effect: On a Hope win, upgrade one damage die to max value.
critical-effect: Cut through armor, restraints, or environmental barriers.

name: Improved Cyber Spur
description: Enhanced retractable spurs forged from titanium alloy, near undetectable by security scanners.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Cannot be detected by casual scans.
critical-effect: Target is paralyzed for 1 round.

name: Improved Shock Baton
description: Upgraded battery coils deliver chained electrical arcs between multiple nearby targets.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Spend 1 Stress to arc lightning to another Very Close target.
critical-effect: Targets nervous system locks up; they drop gear.

name: Improved Vibro-Knife
description: Precision-tuned vibration edge allows for armor penetration and silent, efficient kills.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Ignores 1 level of armor.
critical-effect: Severe damage ignoring defenses.

name: Smartpistol Mk II
description: Improved ballistic computer with predictive recoil compensation and infrared tracking.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Auto-correct; reroll a miss once per scene.
critical-effect: Disable optics or key sensors.

name: Compact SMG
description: A miniaturized submachine gun favored by covert teams — concealable but vicious in a firefight.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Spend Hope to hit two targets in Close range.
critical-effect: Panic/disrupt all enemies in Very Close range.

name: Military Assault Rifle
description: Hardened composite frame with select-fire and tactical uplink for squad-level coordination.
cybermancy-feature-effect: On Hope win, all enemies in line of fire mark Stress.
critical-effect: Ignore armor; bullets chew through cover.

name: Street Sweeper Shotgun
description: Heavy drum-fed shotgun designed to clear rooms and alleys in seconds.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Attack all targets in Very Close range once per scene.
critical-effect: Target knocked prone and loses next turn.

name: Scoped Sniper Rifle
description: Enhanced optics suite allows bullet trajectory correction and real-time target telemetry.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Aim for advantage; crit chance rises if aiming 1 round.
critical-effect: Shot penetrates multiple targets.

name: Fragmentation Grenade+
description: Factory-tuned military variant with denser shrapnel spread and wider kill radius.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Half damage to adjacent zones.
critical-effect: Full damage in wider zone (Far).

name: EMP Grenade+
description: Improved electromagnetic charge capable of disabling entire comm grids in seconds.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Drones/tech roll at Disadvantage.
critical-effect: All tech shuts down until reboot.

name: Corporate Mono-Whip
description: A high-grade monofilament weapon issued to elite corp assassins — silent, perfect, final.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Can slice through vehicles on Hope crit.
critical-effect: Destroy one environmental object (door, drone, wall).

name: Titanium Cyber Spurs
description: Polished titanium spurs with self-cleaning servos and monomolecular precision edges.
cybermancy-feature-effect: +2 to first attack in combat.
critical-effect: Cripple targets mobility permanently.

name: Heavy Shock Baton
description: Industrial security baton capable of stunning cybernetic brutes and armored enforcers alike.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Spend 2 Hope, arc to 2 additional targets.
critical-effect: Target incapacitated (stun or KO).

name: Combat Vibro-Blade
description: Balanced for extended melee, this knife hums with a subsonic pulse designed for battlefield chaos.
cybermancy-feature-effect: +2 to all attack rolls this scene after a hit.
critical-effect: Additional 1d12 bleed damage next turn.

name: Smartpistol Elite
description: High-end model linked directly to neural networks for predictive targeting.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Always ignore cover.
critical-effect: Severe damage ignoring all armor.

name: Advanced SMG
description: Modular close-combat firearm with smart recoil dampers and ammo tracking.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Once per rest, attack 3 targets in Close.
critical-effect: Enemies must Retreat or mark Stress.

name: Advanced Assault Rifle
description: Elite-issue firearm capable of sustained fire with minimal barrel drift.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Spend Hope, double damage dice.
critical-effect: Mow down cover, forcing enemies into open.

name: Riot Shotgun
description: Crowd-control platform launching high-impact kinetic or shock shells to suppress hostiles.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Push targets back one range band.
critical-effect: Stun all in Close cone.

name: Anti-Materiel Sniper
description: Long-range rail weapon capable of puncturing vehicles, mechs, and even bunkers.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Shoot through walls/vehicles.
critical-effect: Instantly remove non-boss foe.

name: Cluster Grenade
description: A multi-charge fragmentation device that detonates across several zones at once.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Hit two separate zones.
critical-effect: Full damage in all adjacent zones.

name: EMP Cascade
description: A cascading EMP charge that disables all systems across multiple networks simultaneously.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Devices take 2 rounds to recover.
critical-effect: Deckers hit take HP damage directly.

name: Legendary Monofilament Whip
description: The apex of weaponized filaments, capable of cutting through armor, steel, or reality itself.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Can slice vehicles, turrets, drones.
critical-effect: Slice environment  create a permanent gap or hazard.

name: Diamond Cyber Spurs
description: Mirror-finish diamond-tipped spurs designed for surgical precision and absolute silence.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Cannot be tracked by sensors.
critical-effect: Target permanently disabled unless cybernetically healed.

name: Thunder Baton
description: Electrified shock weapon tuned for area suppression, discharging arcs of blinding light and sound.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Once per rest, stun all enemies in Close range.
critical-effect: Wipe out all small electronics in scene.

name: Nano Vibro-Blade
description: A nano-edged weapon that self-sharpens at the molecular level, slicing even through armor plating.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Ignore all armor values.
critical-effect: Narratively kill or disable any single non-boss foe.

name: Smartpistol Omega
description: An AI-driven sidearm that learns its wielder’s habits and compensates perfectly in combat.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Advantage on all ranged rolls.
critical-effect: Bullet bypasses physical armor; deals Stress + HP.

name: Prototype SMG
description: Experimental gyro-balanced SMG capable of recoil-free sustained bursts.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Fire with no recoil penalty.
critical-effect: Hit all enemies in Close range automatically.

name: Gauss Rifle
description: Magnetic accelerator weapon firing hyper-velocity projectiles that punch through anything solid.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Spend Stress to deal double damage dice.
critical-effect: Shot tears through multiple enemies/vehicles in a line.

name: Plasma Shotgun
description: Fires superheated plasma shells that vaporize targets and ignite the surrounding area.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Spend Hope to add 1d8 burn damage.
critical-effect: All targets in blast zone catch fire.

name: Orbital Sniper Rifle
description: A satellite-linked rifle capable of marking and calling down orbital strikes.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Call in orbital fire once per rest.
critical-effect: Obliterate target zone, GM narrates consequences.

name: Annihilation Grenade
description: Compact tactical nuke delivering utter destruction in a small, precise radius.
cybermancy-feature-effect: Single-use, but massive radius.
critical-effect: Entire area wiped  citywide consequences.

name: EMP Singularity
description: A massive EMP charge that disables all systems across multiple networks simultaneously within Very Far range
cybermancy-feature-effect: Kill power grid in 1 km radius once per rest.
critical-effect: Entire Matrix zone crashes beyond repair.
